    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.view.Window.OnWindowDismissedCallback

    public class AppDetails
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    This class deals with the App-Details page, which is shown when the user taps on any app cards displayed on various pages.

        private java.lang.String getHtmlComment()

        Returns:

      • showMore

        public void showMore(android.view.View v)
        This method is executed when a button in the App-Description to show more text on the App-Details page is tapped. It toggles between showing more and less text in the App description section of App-Details page.
        Parameters:
        v - The view contains the Button.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        This method is called automatically when the back button is pressed. It ensures the search results cleared.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
